oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Abernathy, Samuel A., 1936 August 31
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Samuel A. Abernathy, dated November 9th, 1919. Illustrates the first page of the document. The verso notation reads “filed 31 August, 1936 by Harry Hite.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Abernathy family
